question: Statement – I :  Reduction of ester by DIABL-H followed by hydrolysis gives aldehyde.
Statement – II :  Oxidation of benzyl alcohol with aqueous KMnO 4 leads to the formation to
Benzaldehyde.
Among the above statements, identify the correct statement.
options: Both statements – I and II are false
Statement – I is true but statement – II is false
Statement – I is false but statement – II is true
Both statements – I and II are true.
